problem.markdown:
1. In EDM process the crater depth is ( ) Not related to crater diameter. ( ) More than crater diameter. (x) Less than crater diameter. ( ) Equal to crater diameter.
2. The metal removal rate in Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM) process is more when ( ) Independent of tool material ( ) Tool material is a bad conductor ( ) The tool material is harder. (x) The tool material is softer.
3. The metal removal rate is dependent on ( ) Only on Pulse width. ( ) Only on Current passing. ( ) None of the above. ( ) Only on applied voltage. (x) All of the above
4. In MRR estimation Lazeranko’s model considers ( ) Convection mode of heat transfer. ( ) Radiation mode of heat transfer. (x) All of the above. ( ) None of the above
5. In EDM, the machining rate using a given tool is more (x) For softer material. ( ) Independent of material properties. ( ) Non conductive materials. ( ) For harder material.
problem.p: 1. In EDM process the crater depth is
2. The metal removal rate in Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM) process is more when

choicegroup.choice: Tool material is a bad conductor

problem.p: 3. The metal removal rate is dependent on
4. In MRR estimation Lazeranko’s model considers
5. In EDM, the machining rate using a given tool is more
